catch_copy: Easy! Cute! But deep! A fun puzzle game with the cats of Nyanten Island, “PUNYAN”!
description:
The wildly popular “Punyan” from Nintendo Switch™ returns on Nintendo Switch™ 2 with new modes!
Enjoy an even more intuitive “Punyan” experience with mouse support!

PUNNYAN is a falling puzzle and merge game to enjoy together with cute cats living on the Nyanten Island!
The game is easy to play with simple controls, but with the addition of original rules, a new puzzle experience awaits you, requiring a deep strategy!
The game features an online ranking system that allows you to compete with players from around the world, as well as offline competitions for up to four players!
You can enjoy the game in your favorite style, whether you want to master the game by yourself or have a lot of fun playing against other players!

Game Mode Descriptions
■∞ Squishy
　A brand new mouse-only mode! Click on the pot containing Punyan to discover them!
■Single Play
　This is an offline-only mode where up to 4 players can enjoy cooperative or competitive play!
■Simple Battle
　　Send “Obstacle Bone” to your opponent by erasing “PUNYAN”! The winner is the one who doesn't spill any “PUNYAN” or “Obstacle Bone” until the end.
■Rotation Battle
　　The winner is the one who takes turns and does not spill any “PUNYAN” until the end of the game.
■Coop Play
　　Each player fires a “PUNYAN”! Players can cooperate with each other and aim for a high score.
■NonStop Battle
　　The winner is the one who does not spill any “PUNYAN” until the end of the game.
■Speed Battle
　　The first player to create the largest “PUNYAN” on the island, “TENOU”, the fastest wins.
■PICTURE BOOK
　This is an illustrated book function that provides information on the 10 attractive PUNYAN characters that live on Nyanten Island.
We hope that the time you spend with the PUNYAN will be a new pleasure for you!
network_feature_description:
This software supports the following:
- Touch screen
